name: Full Metal Hustle
description:
Full Metal Hustle is a small local multiplayer game for PC made in a 2.5 day game jam.

2 - 4 players compete for the highest score by grabbing items off a revolving conveyor belt. Some items are worth more than others, and some items are bad and will slow you down!

Supports 2 players on keyboard, or up to 4 players with keyboard/Xbox controllers.

Designers: Dogan Sevik, Jack Wilson
Artists: Sam Kaewkhiao, Michelle Ceballos, Amanda Jovel
Programmers: Ethun Moffatt, David Floyd
